sentences.sContent: The synergic extraction is main to from multicomponent complex of mixed ligand in extractive separation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The synergic extraction is main to from multicomponent complex of mixed ligand in extractive separation.
sentences.sCn: 溶剂萃取分离中的协同萃取，是形成混配多元络合物的主要表现。

sentences.sContent: A high efficient mixed paraffin remover was prepared with benzene, mutual solvent A, mutual solvent B, and a synergic agent as materials.
sentences.sContent_eng: A high efficient mixed paraffin remover was prepared with benzene, mutual solvent A, mutual solvent B, and a synergic agent as materials.
sentences.sCn: 针对我国油井结蜡严重的现象，以苯、互溶剂A、互溶剂B和协同剂为原料，制备了一种高效混合清蜡剂。

sentences.sContent: The absolute effect, relative effect as well as the elastic modulus and synergic relationship to judge improvement effect of the established predictive model were defined.
sentences.sContent_eng: The absolute effect, relative effect as well as the elastic modulus and synergic relationship to judge improvement effect of the established predictive model were defined.
sentences.sCn: 定义了改善方案预测的绝对效果、相对效果以及指标改善效果有效性判别的弹性系数和协同关系。
